title: look'n for people
body: hey im an older guy who jokes around alot has fun some younger people get offended by my jokes, i dont get offended, i dont mean anything personal but im just looking for people toplay some norms with and have fun maybe some flex ranked who know's i do play to win i dont go into games and troll but at the same time i dont rage and just look to have fun sometimes i stream but i warn you i have health issues and sometimes i can't play very well and i also play 1 handed but there are times were i hold my own and play well, anyhow add Grumpy Granpa, Toxic Granpa, and  Granpa we can play and have some fun
